mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_model(model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{modelId}, #{modelName}, #{modelType}, #{apiId}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_client_model SET model_name = #{modelName}, model_type = #{modelType}, api_id = #{apiId}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE ai_client_model SET model_name = #{modelName}, model_type = #{modelType}, api_id = #{apiId}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE ai_client_model SET model_name = #{modelName}, model_type = #{modelType}, api_id = #{apiId}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE model_id = #{modelId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE model_id = #{modelId}
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE api_id = #{apiId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE model_type = #{modelType} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model WHERE status = 1
SELECT id, model_id, model_name, model_type, api_id, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_model
